verses.verse: And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8798><s%> upon thy feet <S%H7272><s%>, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee.

And the spirit <S%H7307><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into me when he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto me, and set <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me upon my feet <S%H7272><s%>, that I heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him that spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8693><s%> unto me.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, I send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, to a rebellious <S%H4775><s%> <S%H8802><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> that hath rebelled <S%H4775><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against me: they and their fathers <S%H1><s%> have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against me, even unto this very <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

For they are impudent <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6440><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> and stiffhearted <S%H2389><s%> <S%H3820><s%>. I do send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee unto them; and thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

And they, whether they will hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, or whether they will forbear <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, (for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>,) yet shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that there hath been a prophet <S%H5030><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

And thou, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of them, neither be afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of their words <S%H1697><s%>, though briers <S%H5621><s%> and tshofars <S%H5544><s%> be with thee, and thou dost dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> among scorpions <S%H6137><s%>: be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of their words <S%H1697><s%>, nor be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8735><s%> at their looks <S%H6440><s%>, though they be a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.

And thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> unto them, whether they will hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, or whether they will forbear <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for they are most rebellious <S%H4805><s%>.

But thou, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> what I say <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8764><s%> unto thee; Be not <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou rebellious <S%H4805><s%> like that rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>: open <S%H6475><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8798><s%> that I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee.
And when I looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, behold, an hand <S%H3027><s%> was sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8803><s%> unto me; and, lo, a roll <S%H4039><s%> of a book <S%H5612><s%> was therein;

And he spread <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> me; and it was written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> within <S%H6440><s%> and without <S%H268><s%>: and there was written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> therein lamentations <S%H7015><s%>, and mourning <S%H1899><s%>, and woe <S%H1958><s%>.
